headline: This Week In AI Chips - Global AI Industry Leaders Unite for Innovative Growth at Summit
summary: The "Towards the Light: Co-creating a New Global Journey in the AI Field â€” 2025 AI Intelligent Development Summit" recently held in Hong Kong gathered global AI industry leaders to discuss trends and foster international collaboration in AI. Hosted by AIFEEX, the summit emphasized the rapid development and integration of AI technologies, aiming to drive innovative growth in the field.
